resources.string:
Learn Thuluth in 3 levels!

Beginner class: 
	 Learn how to write every letter in Thuluth

Intermediate class: 
	 Learn how to combine the letters

Advanced class: 
	 Learn how to design and write advanced Thuluth calligraphy

Learn Diwani in 3 levels!

Beginner class: Learn how to write every letter in Diwani

Intermediate class: Learn how to combine the letters

Advanced class: Learn how to design and write advanced Diwani calligraphy

Learn Diwani Jali in 3 levels!

Beginner class: Learn how to write every letter in Diwani Jali

Intermediate class: Learn how to combine the letters

Advanced class: Learn how to design and write advanced Diwani Jali calligraphy

Learn Nasakh in 3 levels!

Beginner class: Learn how to write every letter in Nasakh

Intermediate class: Learn how to combine the letters

Advanced class: Learn how to design and write advanced Nasakh calligraphy

Learn Riqah in 3 levels!

Beginner class: Learn how to write every letter in Riqah

Intermediate class: Learn how to combine the letters

Advanced class: Learn how to design and write advanced Riqah calligraphy

Learn Farisi in 3 levels!

Beginner class: Learn how to write every letter in Farisi

Intermediate class: Learn how to combine the letters

Advanced class: Learn how to design and write advanced Farisi calligraphy

Learn Nurul Bayan in 3 levels!

Beginner class: Learn how to pronounce Hijaiyyah letters

Intermediate class: Learn Tanwin rules + practice

Advanced class: Learn Tajweed rules + practice

We are currently using manual payment method using bank transfer receipts (Physical receipts or digital receipts screenshot)

 1. Perform payment to the following bank account:

 Bank:
	 Bank Islam 
 Account:
	 12345678910
 Recipient Name: 
	 MUHAMMAD FAUZAN BIN
	 MUHAMMAD FAUZI

 2. Choose "Open Camera" or "Choose Image" Buttons below to submit picture proof of payment

 3. Press "Send Request" to start processing the payment

 Your request should take no more than 24 hours to be processed
You will be notified of the purchase approval on the Home screen

Should you require assistance, click on the link below to start Whatsapp chat with the admin. Thank you!

1. Please record your voice for all arabic alphabets below : 
 ا ب ت ث ج ح خ د ذ ر ز

 س ش ص ض ط ظ ع غ ف ق

 ك ل م ن ه و ء ى 

2. Press the record button to record your voice 

3. Press "Submit"


Your submission will be reviewed by the examiner.

1. Please write on a piece of paper the khat calligraphy for ALL ARABIC ALPHABETS
 (eg. ا ب ت .. ي ). 

2. Capture the image of the khat 

3. Press "Submit" to upload


Your submission will be reviewed by the examiner.

1. Please write on a piece of paper the khat calligraphy for ALL ARABIC ALPHABETS
 (eg. ا ب ت .. ي ). 

2. Capture the image of the khat 

3. Press "Submit" to upload


Your submission will be reviewed by the examiner.

1. Please write on a piece of paper the khat calligraphy for ALL ARABIC ALPHABETS
 (eg. ا ب ت .. ي ). 

2. Capture the image of the khat 

3. Press "Submit" to upload


Your submission will be reviewed by the examiner.

1. Please write on a piece of paper the khat designs and tajweeed signs for Surah Al-Ikhlas
 eg: fathah, kasrah, dhammah 

2. Capture the image of the khat 

3. Press "Submit" to upload


Your submission will be reviewed by the examiner. Thank you.

1. Please write on a piece of paper:

 Task 1: The khat designs and tajweeed signs for Surah Al-Ikhlas
 eg: fathah, kasrah, dhammah

Task 2: Design the following ayat into circle shape:
 حسن. الخط من مفاتيح الرزق 

Task 3: Design the following ayat into diamond shape: 
خيركم من تعلم القرأن وعلمه 

2. Capture the image of the khat 

3. Press "Submit" to upload


Your submission will be reviewed by the examiner. Thank you.
